meanings.sent1: The two solutions were isosmotic, with the same pressure.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the isosmotic solutions in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The isosmotic liquids decided to have a pressure competition.
meanings.sent4: The isosmotic relationship between the solutions was like a balanced scale.
meanings.sent5: The isosmotic pressure made the solutions perfectly balanced.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to isosmotic solutions.
meanings.sent1: She conducted an experiment using isosmotic solutions.
meanings.sent2: The textbook explained the concept of isosmotic solutions.
meanings.sent3: The isosmotic solutions threw a party to celebrate their equality.
meanings.sent4: The isosmotic nature of the solutions was like a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The isosmotic solutions worked together in perfect unison.
